title: 2024 United States presidential election
added: {{As of|2021|9}}, individuals in this section have expressed an interest in running for president within the previous six months.
*** Candidates in this section only need one source, but expressions of interest via social media do not count
*** Sources in this section can go back a maximum of six months

*<!--DO NOT REMOVE, Reason is a reliable source per WP:RSP-->[[Dave Smith (comedian)|Dave Smith]], [[comedian]] and [[podcaster]] from [[New York (state)|New York]]<ref>{{cite news |last1=Gillespie |first1=Nick |author1-link=Nick Gillespie |title=Dave Smith: Libertarians vs. Big Tech, Big Government, and…Other Libertarians |url=https://reason.com/podcast/2021/07/28/dave-smith-libertarians-vs-big-tech-big-government-and-other-libertarians/ |access-date=July 31, 2021 |work=[[Reason (magazine)|Reason]] |date=July 28, 2021}}</ref>

title: 2024 United States presidential election
deleted: *** Potential candidates must have at least TWO separate references from reliable sources that focus primarily on them as a potential candidate

*** Sources should provide substantive discussion of individuals, not a "kitchen sink" listing of numerous people or a minor sentence saying they could possibly run, or where the candidate themselves talks about the 2024 race
*** Sources should be no older than 6 months
As of September 2021, the following people have been subjects of speculation about their potential candidacy within the previous six months.

title: 2024 United States presidential election
added: * [[Joe Biden]], 46th [[President of the United States]] (2021–present); 47th [[Vice President of the United States]] (2009–2017); [[United States Senate|United States Senator]] from [[Delaware]] (1973–2009), [[New Castle County, Delaware|New Castle County]] Councillor for District 4 (1971–1973); [[Democratic Party (United States)|Democratic Party]] candidate for president in [[Joe Biden 2008 presidential campaign|2008]] & [[Joe Biden 1988 presidential campaign|1988]]<ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.rollcall.com/2021/09/16/why-the-2024-presidential-race-will-start-later-than-expected/|title=Why the 2024 presidential race will start later than expected|publisher=Roll Call|date=September 16, 2021}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|url=https://floridapolitics.com/archives/455214-joe-biden-dominates-ron-desantis-in-early-2024-poll/|title=Joe Biden dominates Ron DeSantis in poll of possible 2024 matchups|publisher=Florida Politics|date=September 4, 2021}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.jsonline.com/story/opinion/2021/08/26/joe-biden-may-not-running-reelection-he-running-history/5591232001/|title=Joe Biden may not be running for reelection — yet. He's certainly running for history.|publisher=Milwaukee Journal Sentinel|date=August 26, 2021}}</ref>
